verse:
यस्य देवे परा भक्तिर्यथा देवे तथा गुरौ।
तस्यैते कथिता ह्यर्थाः प्रकाशन्ते महात्मनः प्रकाशन्ते महात्मन इति॥
meaning: Meaning:The verse explains that for the one who has supreme devotion towards God, just as towards the teacher, the mentioned meanings/benefits are revealed to such noble souls.
